update log_day_xh_media_user
DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_ID = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ACTIVE_USER = #{activeUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},

SITE_CODE = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update log_day_xh_media_user set DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN_ID = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_USER = #{newUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACTIVE_USER = #{activeUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USE_LENGTH = #{useLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SITE_CODE = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT DATE, u.origin_id, u.origin_name,channel_id,channel_name, NEW_USER, ACTIVE_USER, USE_LENGTH, u.site_code,NAME AS siteName FROM (log_day_xh_media_user u INNER JOIN sys_groups groups ON ( u.site_code=groups.id)) INNER JOIN index_xh_media_origin origin ON ( u.site_code=origin.site_code AND u.origin_id=origin.origin_id)
WHERE
u.site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
u.SITE_CODE in
#{item} AND date between #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY
${item}

SELECT DATE,hour,origin_id,origin_name,channel_id,channel_name, NEW_USER, ACTIVE_USER, USE_LENGTH , site_code FROM log_day_xh_media_user WHERE
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
date between #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY HOUR DESC ,NEW_USER DESC

SELECT DATE, origin_id,origin_name,channel_id,channel_name, SUM(NEW_USER) AS NEW_USER,SUM(ACTIVE_USER) AS ACTIVE_USER, SUM(USE_LENGTH) AS USE_LENGTH ,site_code FROM log_day_xh_media_user WHERE
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
SITE_CODE in
#{item} AND date between #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY date ORDER BY date,NEW_USER DESC

SELECT DATE,hour,origin_id,origin_name,channel_id,channel_name, SUM(NEW_USER) AS NEW_USER,SUM(ACTIVE_USER) AS ACTIVE_USER, SUM(USE_LENGTH) AS USE_LENGTH , site_code FROM log_day_xh_media_user WHERE
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
SITE_CODE in
#{item} AND date between #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY date ORDER BY HOUR ,NEW_USER DESC

SELECT ORIGIN_NAME,SUM(NEW_USER) AS NEW_USER ,SUM(ACTIVE_USER) AS ACTIVE_USER ,SUM(USE_LENGTH) USE_LENGTH FROM log_day_xh_media_user WHERE
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
SITE_CODE in
#{item} AND date between #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY ORIGIN_ID ORDER BY NEW_USER DESC
SELECT SUM(NEW_USER) AS NEW_USER,SUM(ACTIVE_USER) AS ACTIVE_USER,SUM(USE_LENGTH) AS USE_LENGTH FROM log_day_xh_media_user
